properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 10:31PM AKST until February 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation of freezing rain and snow.
Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice
accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Juneau, especially the Mendenhall Valley.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and very slick
sidewalks and steps. Use handrails whenever possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain should begin to transition to
snow and rain by early Tuesday morning as temperatures rise
overnight.
properties.instruction:
driveways if you can.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY
